publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-114 Patrick Harvie: Independent Asylum Commission—That the Parliament welcomes the Independent Asylum Commission (IAC) as its roadshow comes to Glasgow; notes that asylum seekers continue to be removed in distressing and unnecessary dawn raids; applauds the IAC’s intention to listen to the testimonies of asylum seekers and refugees, which are often left out of the debate on asylum; agrees that the asylum process regularly leaves individuals facing unfair treatment, destitution and a loss of dignity, and encourages those with experience of the asylum process to contribute to the work of the IAC by submitting oral, written or recorded testimony.

S3M-114 Independent Asylum Commission (lodged on 4 June 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*, Bob Doris*, Rob Gibson*, Elaine Smith*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Butler*, Liam McArthur*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jamie Hepburn*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-114 Independent Asylum Commission (lodged on 4 June 2007) Robert Brown*, Ian McKee*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Bill Wilson*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S3M-114 Independent Asylum Commission (lodged on 4 June 2007) Roseanna Cunningham*
